Projects

Sneak peak into my current and past projects

List It Web App

Python Flask webframework, SQLite DB and Bootstrap. Utilizing error pages and pagination users can edit update and delete items in this live functional app where users can share lists with the public. If a user needs to maintain privacy an account's setting can be changed.

Pagination allows ease of traversing all items. This is a one stop shop for grocery shopping and running errands.

Budget It

Using Python libraries including MatPlotLib, RegEx, Pandas, pdfplumber to distill Credit Card budgeting into a simple monthly historical bar graph.

Unit Testing ensures program functions and interprets spend data consitantly.

A Pantry! App

My programming bootcamp capstone project: Tracks users kitchen & meal needs. I created the backend infrastrutcture using postgres database, Ruby on Rails backend. Using an API to generate recipe recommendations based on current items in your house. Building on top of Rails backend I utilized Vue.js to build a frontend framework. Vue.js frontend dynamically track items in your grocery list and pantry according to recipes selected.

About Me

Growing up I have always been fascinated by tech and how it changes our lives. From an early age I jumped into HTML courses and graphic designing. I've grown to realize the tech industry compliments my natural creativity, passions, and curiousity.

Professionally trained as an accountant from compliance to operational audit I've gained invaluable skills necessary to understand complex processes and work with varied team across all levels of a company.

When my department first introduced me to the capabilities of automation using Python I have not looked back. From getting my feet wet with small projects. I continually grew my technical knowledge through integrating APIs, leading interactive lessons/presentations, and self-teaching. This all led completing an entire full-stack programming bootcamp in the second half of 2020.

Brewing and Biking


In my free time I love to run, bike and brew.

I have been brewing for multiple years now and studied the science behind the magic of frementation. I love the practical and satisfying reward of brewing beer both lagers and ales. I have an all-grain brewing system that i've used for the past few years to concoct a myriad of seasonal beverages. I have even been recocgnized for my award winning saison. I love share my beers with friends, teach co-workers how to brew, and even take with to picnics and camping trips.

When I'm not brewing or board gaming with friends during my freetime, I enjoy biking along lake shore taking in Chicago's skyline.

Every few years you can find me under the scortching summer sun touring across a midwestern state while hauling my camping gear on RAGBRAI in Iowa or Katy Trail Ride in Missouri.
